mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVNT_PRDT (EVNT_PRDT_ID , EVNT_ID , PRDT_ID , EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , USE_YN , DEL_YN) VALUES ('EP-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_EVNT_PRDT_PK.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') ,'EV-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_EVNT_PK.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') ,'PD-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_PRDT_PK.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , #{evntPrdtChngPrc} , NVL(#{useYn},'N') ,'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT E.EVNT_PRDT_ID , E.EVNT_ID , E.PRDT_ID , P.PRDT_NM , P.PRDT_PRC , E.EVNT_PRDT_CHNG_PRC , E.USE_YN , E.DEL_YN FROM EVNT_PRDT E LEFT OUTER JOIN PRDT P ON E.PRDT_ID = P.PRDT_ID WHERE E.EVNT_ID = #{evntId} AND E.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT PRDT_ID , PRDT_NM , PRDT_PRC , USE_YN , DEL_YN FROM PRDT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
